712705f-a.title: Manhattan: 41st Street - 1st Avenue
712705f-a.text:
(1)
41st Street, south side, west from No. 330 between First and
Second Avenues.
May 11, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, not showing much beyond Second Avenue. The Tudor
City development has begun, and most of the old houses have
been demolished.
January 24, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
